firstSection.title: UDocument - Professional Document Services for Real Estate in Ukraine and Document Legalization in the UK, Turkey, and European Countries.
firstSection.paragraph: Our team of experienced lawyers specializes in legal support for real estate transactions. We assist you in obtaining and legalizing property documents, providing complete support at every stage. With years of experience, we successfully handle even the most complex legal issues, regardless of the country where you are conducting operations.

secondSection.title: Our Team of Professionals
secondSection.paragraph: Meet our team of experienced lawyers and attorneys with years of experience in real estate, international transaction support, and legal issue resolution. We provide a personalized approach to each client, ensuring high service standards and reliable legal solutions for complex situations.

cardsData.description: Offices in the UK, Turkey, Ukraine

thirdSection.title: Our Professional Legal Services
thirdSection.paragraph: Our team offers a wide range of legal services, from real estate consultations to legal documentation and assistance in complex situations. We provide reliable solutions for your business and real estate, ensuring legal support at every stage.

cardData.title: Business Legal Support
cardData.description: We offer comprehensive legal support for your business, including legal consultations, document preparation, and court representation. We assist with taxation, contracts, and corporate law issues.

cardData.title: Real Estate Services
cardData.description: Our experts provide complete legal and technical support in real estate: from document verification to transaction processing. We ensure the safety of your investments and compliance with legal standards.

aproachSection.description: Innovative Solutions for Real Estate Documentation
Reliable Protection of Your Rights and Interests

consultationSection.title: Expert Legal Assistance and Consultations
consultationSection.paragraph: Schedule a free consultation with our experienced lawyers to receive personalized advice on real estate, business, and other legal matters. We will help you find the optimal solutions for your legal needs.

contactsSection.paragraph: For consultations, please contact us using the following information:
contactsSection.title: Our Contacts

formContactSection.title: Write to Us
formContactSection.paragraph: For consultations, please contact us using the following information:

headingSection.title: Expert Legal and Real Estate Specialists
headingSection.paragraph: We provide high-quality legal consultations and services in the fields of real estate, business, and general law. Our team of experts is ready to help you resolve any legal issue quickly and professionally.

ourHistorySection.title: Our History and Commitment to Legal Excellence
ourHistorySection.paragraph: UDocument is a leading legal organization established to provide exceptional legal support in the areas of real estate, business, and general legal assistance. Dedicated to high standards, our highly qualified lawyers have been successfully resolving complex legal issues for clients for many years. Professionalism and a personal approach make us reliable partners for your legal needs.

ourTeamSection.title: Our Team of Experienced Lawyers
ourTeamSection.paragraph: Meet our team of professionals, each with extensive experience in various fields of law. We offer personalized consultations and comprehensive solutions to ensure successful legal support for your interests.

advocateServicesPage.title: Comprehensive Legal Services and Business Legal Support
advocateServicesPage.paragraph: Our lawyers offer a wide range of services for businesses and individuals. From legal support for real estate transactions to comprehensive protection of your rights and interests in court. We will assist you in resolving the most complex legal issues.

mainSection.title: Execution Times and Custom Pricing
mainSection.paragraph: Execution times and the cost of our services depend on the complexity of the case and the availability of necessary documents. We offer a free consultation during which our specialists will assess your situation and provide detailed information about possible solutions, timelines, and costs. Our team is always focused on effective solutions tailored to your needs. Our lawyers will assist with all aspects of legal matters related to real estate and other areas of law. We provide assistance with the following:

advocateServicesData.title: Legal Services
services: Property ownership documentation for apartments, houses, or commercial spaces (buying-selling, certificates, investment contracts, etc.).
Obtaining and processing the owner’s passport and identification code.
Court representation in commercial, administrative, civil, and criminal cases.

advocateServicesData.title: Business Legal Support
services: Drafting property purchase agreements for your business.
Assistance with business registration, tax consultations, court representation, obtaining necessary licenses and permits, ongoing legal support for business activities.

advocateServicesData.title: Migration Services
services: Obtaining necessary documents for property ownership abroad.

propertyServicesPage.title: Comprehensive Real Estate Services
propertyServicesPage.paragraph: We offer a full range of services in real estate: from technical support to legal assistance. Our experts will assist you at all stages—from document processing to bringing the property into operation.

mainSection.title: Service Times and Costs
mainSection.paragraph: Times and costs depend on the complexity of your case, available documentation, and the current status of the property. We are ready to provide qualified support at all stages of bringing the property into operation or processing ownership rights. During the free consultation, our experts will assess your needs and tailor optimal timelines and costs for the services.

advocateServicesData.title: Technical Passport and Reports
services: Property ownership documentation for apartments, houses, or commercial spaces (buying-selling, certificates, investment contracts, etc.).
Obtaining a technical passport or relevant reports.
Preparing passports and identification codes for owners.

advocateServicesData.title: Combining or Dividing Real Estate
services: Property ownership documentation for real estate.
Preparation and updating of technical passports.
Assistance with obtaining necessary documents and registering ownership.

advocateServicesData.title: Property Ownership Registration
services: Preparation and submission of necessary documents for property ownership registration.
Registration of passports and identification codes for owners.

thankyouPage.title: Thank you, we have received your request. A manager will contact you shortly.
